law.catch_line: The purpose of this part is to enable:...
law.text:
The purpose of this part is to enable:
State and local agencies to respond to requests for public records without disclosing the location of a victim of domestic violence;
interagency cooperation in providing address confidentiality for victims of domestic violence; and
State and local agencies to accept a Program participant's use of an address designated by the Office of the Secretary of State as a substitute address.
